Military Spouse Program

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1548112759237{padding-top: 120px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Employing military spouses across the country

 

It’s not easy to maintain your career when your significant other serves in the military. You make sacrifices to support your family and this nation, but your professional life doesn’t have to be one of those sacrifices. You deserve to have it all.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

Flexibility is our specialty

 

That’s why we created ATR’s Military Commitment, a program focused on placing military spouses in internal ATR positions that offer tremendous flexibility. Several of our locations are near military bases which makes relocating easier, and we can modify roles to meet your schedule. Whether you want career counseling to help you reenter the workforce or simply need a flexible job, ATR has your back.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”5747″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”5642″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

 

Progress your career

 

The patience, dedication, and strength that military spouses like you possess are the same traits that can lead to a successful career. Our specialty is harnessing your skills and applying them within ATR’s walls. We want to support you so you can continue to support your family and this country. It’s the least we can do to say thank you for all that you’ve done for us.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Take the next step in your career.
Get in touch with us today.

Why Employing Military Veterans & Spouses Is Critical for Businesses

12.15.2023 | Hiring, Hiring Manager Blogs, Podcasts, Veteran Program

Last month’s Veterans Day ceremonies around the country, honoring the men and women of our armed forces, were beautiful and moving. We are in debt to all those who choose to serve and protect our nation, whether it is for a few years or a full career. November was also Military Family Appreciation month, because […]

3 Ways to Maximize Veteran Job Support from a Staffing Agency

12.04.2023 | Career Advice, Job Search, Veteran Program

As a veteran, you’ve developed exceptional skills that can be applied to any workplace. Everything you’ve learned during your time in service—from cultivating leadership skills and strong work ethic to building resilience and clear communication skills—can make you an asset in your next career. But stigmas against veterans can lead to challenges in your job […]

7 Key Benefits of Hiring Veterans & Military Spouses

11.21.2023 | ATR International, Hiring, Hiring Manager Blogs, Veteran Program

Pride for our American heroes is deeply woven into the fabric of our nation, but appreciation has yet to lead to inclusion in the hiring game. Veterans continue to endure stigmas that bind them to low-skill positions—and the military spouses supporting active-duty personnel face an unwavering 22% unemployment rate.
